Windlord/Termitron/Nightlight::

Nighlight saw Lynzix in danger so she fired 25 energy-balls against  
Stranato.

Termitron Ran and slashed Stranato's back while Windlord landed 
around Lynxiz and took her in arms, he doubed to lef his friends 
fighthing against Stranato, when Nighlight saw Windlord doubt she 
screamed "We can handle him!!!"

Windlord ran towards the zhip while he opned his comm link to 
Grounded "Grounded let me come in!!!!"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> --- Lynxiz ---
> 
> Lynxiz takes the shot in the chest. A hole appears, and fried 
> cicuitry appears. She stumbles back, and goes too one knee. 
> "You'll *ughhh* pay for that, and for messing with my *ughhh* 
> friends." She grunts, gets up, moving towards Stranato. She circles 
> warily, then comes in hard, slashing with her left set of claws at 
> Stranato's gun, and again with her right set of claws at his left 
arm. 
> She grits her teeth in pain as she attacks.
> 
> 
> On 22 May 2001, at 2:36, Soulstice Omega wrote:
> 
> > Stranato holds up his rifle in front of his face. Lynxiz falls on 
top
> > of him and pushes him to the ground.
> > 
> > Stranato: Ha! Sneak attack from behind? Predacon scum!
> > 
> > Stranato tapped his wrist with the tip of his rifle and a small 
beam
> > emitted, slicing through the rifle and cutting the tip off of it, 
then
> > heading for Lynxiz...
